ac: 21, touch 7, flat-footed 21 (+9 armor, -2 Dex, +5 natural, -1 size)
other_gear: full plate, greatclub, javelins (3), mwk greatsword, 342 gp
feats: Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Lunge, Power Attack, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (greatsword), Weapon Specialization (greatsword)

sections.body: During Combat The ogre boss closes with soft-looking enemies and uses her massive reach (with Lunge, if necessary) to box them in.
sections.name: Tactics

name: Ogre Boss
combat_gear: potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of cure moderate wounds, bag of tricks (gray)
